t: Amazon Ads Launches Fortnite Game 'The Glitch' for Brand Marketing
s: September 19, 2024 - Titled “The Glitch,” the project is described as “an integrated galaxy of brand-customized playable worlds” within “Fortnite” created by “Halo” co-creator Alexander Seropian and his Look North World game developer. ... t: DoorDash & Twitch team up with Amazon Ads for ‘Battle of the Brands’ on Fortnite | The Drum
s: February 21, 2025 - “Since its launch last year, ‘The Glitch’ has become a unique space for brands of all kinds to forge meaningful ties to Twitch’s key audience of Gen Zers and millennials,” said Andrea Garabedian, Amazon Ads’ head of brand partnership studio.

t: Amazon and Twitch Launch In-Game Brand Experience in Fortnite | DesignRush
s: September 26, 2024 - Amazon and Twitch launched "The Glitch," a new gaming experience set to offer promotional opportunities to brands within Fortnite.
